SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO CT_PLAN_MGMT (PLAN_TITLE, PLAN_DESC, PUBLIC_YN, TRIP_START_DATE, TRIP_END_DATE, TRIP_TERM, REG_NO, REG_DTIME, UPT_NO, UPT_DTIME) VALUES (#{planTitle:VARCHAR}, #{planDescription:VARCHAR}, #{publicYn:VARCHAR}, #{tripStartDate:VARCHAR}, #{tripEndDate:VARCHAR}, DATEDIFF(#{tripEndDate:VARCHAR}, #{tripStartDate:VARCHAR}), #{memberNo:NUMERIC}, now(), 0, now());

INSERT INTO CT_TRIP_ADDR (PLAN_NO, ADDR_NO, REG_NO, REG_DTIME, UPT_NO, UPT_DTIME) VALUES
(#{planAddressVO.planNo:NUMERIC}, #{planAddressVO.addressNo:NUMERIC}, #{planAddressVO.memberNo:NUMERIC}, now(), 0 , now())

INSERT INTO CT_PLAN_ATTR (PLAN_NO, ATTR_NO, REG_NO, REG_DTIME, UPT_NO, UPT_DTIME) VALUES
(#{planAttributeVO.planNo:NUMERIC}, #{planAttributeVO.attributeNo:NUMERIC}, #{planAttributeVO.memberNo:NUMERIC}, now(), 0 , now())

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO CT_PLAN_ATTR_MGMT (ATTR_NM, ATTR_TP_CD, USE_YN, REG_NO, REG_DTIME, UPT_NO, UPT_DTIME) VALUES (#{attributeName:NUMERIC}, #{attributeTypeCode:VARCHAR}, 'Y', 0, now(), 0, now());
INSERT INTO CT_PLAN_MATE (PLAN_NO, MBR_NO, LEAD_YN, REG_NO, REG_DTIME, UPT_NO, UPT_DTIME) VALUES (#{planNo:NUMERIC}, #{memberNo:NUMERIC}, #{leadYn:VARCHAR}, #{memberNo:NUMERIC}, now(), 0, now());
mapper.select: SELECT plan.PLAN_NO, plan.PLAN_TITLE, plan.PLAN_DESC, plan.PUBLIC_YN, plan.TRIP_START_DATE, plan.TRIP_END_DATE, plan.TRIP_TERM, plan.LIKE_REG_CNT, plan.ACHV_RATE, plan.VIEWS, plan.REV_AVG_SCORE, mate.LEAD_YN, plan.REG_DTIME FROM CT_PLAN_MGMT plan, CT_PLAN_MATE mate WHERE plan.PLAN_NO = mate.PLAN_NO AND plan.USE_YN = 'Y' AND mate.MBR_NO = #{memberNo:VARCHAR};

SELECT addr.PLAN_NO, addr.ADDR_NO, mgmt.SIDO_NM, mgmt.SIGUNGU_NM FROM CT_PLAN_MGMT plan, CT_TRIP_ADDR addr, CT_ADDR_MGMT mgmt WHERE plan.PLAN_NO = addr.PLAN_NO AND addr.ADDR_NO = mgmt.ADDR_NO AND plan.PLAN_NO = #{planNo:NUMERIC};

SELECT attr.PLAN_NO, attr.ATTR_NO, mgmt.ATTR_NM, mgmt.ATTR_TP_CD FROM CT_PLAN_MGMT plan, CT_PLAN_ATTR attr, CT_PLAN_ATTR_MGMT mgmt WHERE plan.PLAN_NO = attr.PLAN_NO AND attr.ATTR_NO = mgmt.ATTR_NO AND plan.PLAN_NO = #{planNo:NUMERIC};

SELECT plan.PLAN_NO, plan.PLAN_TITLE, plan.PLAN_DESC, plan.PUBLIC_YN, plan.TRIP_START_DATE, plan.TRIP_END_DATE, plan.TRIP_TERM, plan.LIKE_REG_CNT, plan.ACHV_RATE, plan.VIEWS, plan.REV_AVG_SCORE, plan.REG_DTIME FROM CT_PLAN_MGMT plan WHERE plan.PLAN_NO = #{planNo:VARCHAR} AND plan.USE_YN = 'Y';

SELECT mate.MATE_NO, mate.PLAN_NO, mbr.MBR_NO, mate.LEAD_YN, mbr.MBR_NM, mbr.NICK_NM FROM CT_PLAN_MATE mate, MB_MBR_MGMT mbr, CT_PLAN_MGMT plan WHERE mate.MBR_NO = mbr.MBR_NO AND mate.PLAN_NO = plan.PLAN_NO AND plan.PLAN_NO = #{planNo:VARCHAR} AND plan.USE_YN = 'Y';
mapper.update: UPDATE CT_PLAN_MGMT SET PLAN_TITLE = #{planTitle:VARCHAR}, PLAN_DESC = #{planDescription:VARCHAR}, PUBLIC_YN = #{publicYn:VARCHAR}, TRIP_START_DATE = #{tripStartDate:VARCHAR}, TRIP_END_DATE = #{tripEndDate:VARCHAR}, TRIP_TERM = DATEDIFF(#{tripEndDate:VARCHAR}, #{tripStartDate:VARCHAR}), UPT_NO = #{memberNo:NUMERIC}, UPT_DTIME = now() WHERE PLAN_NO = #{planNo:NUMERIC};

INSERT INTO CT_INVI_CD_MGMT (PLAN_NO, INVI_TP_CD, INVI_CD, INVI_CD_EXPIRE_DTIME, REG_NO, REG_DTIME, UPT_NO, UPT_DTIME) VALUES (#{planNo:VARCHAR}, #{inviteTypeCode:VARCHAR}, #{inviteCode:VARCHAR}, DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), 0, now(), 0, now());
mapper.select: SELECT noti.NOTI_NO, noti.PLAN_NO, noti.POST_NO, noti.NOTI_TP_CD, noti.SENDER_NO, noti.RCVER_NO, noti.NOTI_DTIME, noti.READ_DTIME, (SELECT PLAN_TITLE FROM CT_PLAN_MGMT WHERE PLAN_NO = noti.PLAN_NO) AS PLAN_TITLE, (SELECT POST_TITLE FROM CT_POST_MGMT WHERE POST_NO = noti.POST_NO) AS POST_TITLE, (SELECT MBR_NM FROM MB_MBR_MGMT WHERE MBR_NO = (SELECT MBR_NO FROM CT_PLAN_MATE WHERE PLAN_NO = noti.PLAN_NO AND LEAD_YN = 'Y')) AS LEADER_NAME, (SELECT MBR_NM FROM MB_MBR_MGMT WHERE MBR_NO = noti.SENDER_NO) AS SENDER_NAME, (SELECT USE_YN FROM CT_PLAN_MGMT WHERE PLAN_NO = noti.PLAN_NO) AS USE_YN FROM CT_NOTI_MGMT noti WHERE noti.RCVER_NO = #{memberNo:VARCHAR} AND noti.NOTI_DTIME < now() ORDER BY noti.NOTI_NO DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE CT_NOTI_MGMT SET READ_DTIME = now(), UPT_NO = #{memberNo:VARCHAR}, UPT_DTIME = now() WHERE NOTI_NO = #{notificationNo:VARCHAR};
UPDATE CT_PLAN_MATE SET LEAD_YN = 'Y', UPT_NO = #{memberNo:NUMERIC}, UPT_DTIME = now() WHERE MATE_NO = #{mateNo:VARCHAR};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_PLAN_MATE mate, CT_PLAN_MGMT plan WHERE mate.PLAN_NO = plan.PLAN_NO AND plan.PLAN_NO = #{planNo:VARCHAR};
mapper.update: UPDATE CT_PLAN_MGMT SET USE_YN = 'N', UPT_NO = #{memberNo:NUMERIC}, UPT_DTIME = now() WHERE PLAN_NO = #{planNo:VARCHAR};
